nodes.text: Here There Be Gremlins is an adventure seed contained in the Star Wars Gamemaster Screen. Alliance High Command sends a group of agents to investigate a newly established colony where technology is inexplicably failing several hours after landing on the planet. The cause was a microscopic self replicating organism that fed on power sources, a legacy of a war that destroyed the planet's native species. Possible alternate storylines that could be adapted by a gamemaster were also included. It was written by Bill Olmesdahl.
